title: Paw Patrol, Ryder’s ATV Toy Vehicle with Collectible Action Figure, Sustainably Minded Kids’ Toys for Boys & Girls Aged 3 and Up
features: COLLECTIBLE RYDER FIGURE: This ATV toy vehicle includes a collectible Ryder toy figure. Wearing his signature uniform and helmet, Ryder is ready to save the day
PAW PATROL ATV: Clip Ryder into the driver’s seat of his ATV, which features authentic detailing and working wheels, before racing off on a thrilling mission
SUSTAINABLY MINDED TOY: Ryder and his PAW Patrol ATV are made from at least 52% pre-consumer recycled plastic. Kids can explore their imagination, creating missions with their favourite pup
COLLECT THEM ALL: For more fun, collect all of the PAW Patrol toys, like the Air Rescue kids’ toys, PAW Patrol film toys, dragon toys, stuffed animals, toy figures and playsets (each sold separately)
LEARNING AND EDUCATION TOYS: PAW plush toys and toy cars are toys for girls and boys who enjoy building toys and gifts for kids 3 and up, as an alternative to dolls, dinosaur toys or a train set
description: The PAW Patrol are on a roll in their rescue vehicles. Join Ryder on action-packed missions with his ATV. When trouble strikes, place Ryder in the driver’s seat and roll to the rescue with real working wheels. Featuring authentic detailing and realistic features, the PAW Patrol’s beloved leader and his PAW Patrol vehicle bring all the excitement of the show to life. Ryder and his toy vehicle are eco-consciously manufactured and are made from at least 52% pre-consumer recycled plastic. Team up with all of the PAW toy figures and their rescue vehicles (each sold separately) and help save the day in Adventure Bay. PAW Patrol pre-school toys and toddler learning toys are gifts for kids who are fans of the show, fostering imaginative pretend play and enhanced fine motor skills. Relive your favourite moments from PAW Patrol seasons, like the Mighty Pups and PAW Patrol: The Movie, then create your own adventures with the PAW Patrol pups and their respective toy cars (each sold separately). Elevate the excitement with the complete Action Pups and Air Rescue team sets, which include PAW Patrol vehicles, action figures and toddler toys, for endless hours of PAWsome, series-inspired adventures.
